knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

### Loading requisite packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

### Loading the data set

```{r}
malaria <- read_csv("data/malaria.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

### Tidying up the data set

```{r}
malaria <- malaria %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
               names_to = "age_class",
               values_to = "cases") %>%
    select(newid, data_date, submitted_date, location_name, province,
           district, age_class, cases)
```

### Which district has the highest number of cases

```{r}
malaria %>%
  filter(data_date == "2020-07-30") %>%
  group_by(district) %>%
  summarize(tot_cases=sum(cases, na.rm = T)) %>%
  arrange(-tot_cases)
```
